entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
